author: Bay Area News Group
title: Live chat: Inside the Raiders, Friday at noon
text: Live chat: Inside the Raiders, Friday at noon Bay Area News Group Posted: 10/08/2015 05:41:52 PM PDT Updated: 10/08/2015 05:46:23 PM PDT CHICAGO, IL - OCTOBER 04: Head coach Jack Del Rio of the Oakland Raiders stands on the sidelines in the first half against the Chicago Bears at Soldier Field on October 4, 2015 in Chicago, Illinois. (Photo by David Banks/Getty Images) ( David Banks )
